Words by:

Suzin Wold

Suzin Wold is the Chief Marketing Officer at Sama, where she is helping companies deploy innovative and impactful AI technology. Suzin has 20 years’ experience delivering strategic direction and quantifiable results for early-stage startups and Fortune 100 organizations such as Bazaarvoice, Qlik, Rackspace, PayPal, and P&G. Outside of the office, Suzin volunteers for causes close to her heart with her two children.
